page.title: 14Leisure
page.content: Ditchingham Women's Institute, started in l9l7,is still very active.l985 mem- bership is 35.We learn crafts, hear talks,visit places of interest.Members help in village life - Meals on Wheels serving teas at the local hospital, cooking for village fetes,raising money for charities and helping the school with this project! Some members sew patchwork items for raffles.Our W.I. Choir sings in County Music Fest- ivals and local and County carol con- certs. Young people enjoy leisure through Brownies & Youth Club. Broome Heath is widely used for walking & angling. Other pursuits include running, football, netball, bowls and, for the gardeners there is a horticultural society.
